name: CloudStore Pro
description: Secure cloud storage solution for businesses with advanced file management and sharing capabilities.
features: Team collaboration tools with fine-grained permissions
commonIssues: Sync issues: Try signing out and back in on all devices
Upload failures: Check your internet connection and file size limits
Permission errors: Contact your team admin to verify access rights
Mobile app crashes: Ensure you're using the latest version
pricing: Starting at $8.99/user/month with a 14-day free trial

name: CampaignMaster
description: All-in-one email marketing platform for creating, sending, and analyzing marketing campaigns.
commonIssues: Low delivery rates: Check your sender reputation and follow best practices
Integration errors: Verify API keys and connection settings
Template display issues: Use our preview tool to test across email clients
pricing: Plans from $29/month based on subscriber count

name: SupportHub
description: Customer support ticket management system with omnichannel support capabilities.
features: Unified inbox for email, chat, and social media inquiries
commonIssues: Email notifications not being received: Check spam filters and notification settings
Slow dashboard loading: Clear browser cache or try our desktop app
Integration with other tools: Check our API documentation
